Package com.labyrinth.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Represents a game board containing tiles.
    ComputerPlayer
    Represents a computer opponent for a player to play against in the Labyrinth game.
    GameManager
    Allows for the loading and saving of games.
    Leaderboard
    Represents the leaderboard in the Labyrinth game.
    Player
    Represents a player.
    SettingsManager
    Manages settings and configurations for the Labyrinth game.
    Tile
    Represents a tile for use within a board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Represents a number of possible directions.
    RotationAngle
    Used to represent the choice of possible rotation angles for use with tile manipulation.
    TileType
    Used to represent a tile type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalMoveException
    Thrown when an illegal move occurs.
